extendedInfo.description: The ConcreteCalc Pro calculator for your Android Smartphone is built with the same features and functions, and the same core engine that powers the industry-standard advanced construction-math calculators from Calculated Industries. No learning curve on this calc -- just one powerful, easy-to-use concrete app, giving you the power to calculate square-ups, loads, area, volume, rebar, drops and stairs. This calc even finds the number of bags of concrete / cement required for small jobs. An ideal calc for Concrete & Cement, Masonry, Estimating and Paving Professionals:- Work directly in and convert between all building dimensional formats: yards, feet-inch-fractions, inch fraction, decimal feet (10ths, 100ths), decimal inches and metric (m, cm, mm)- Easily calculate areas, volumes and weight per volume, truck loads of concrete- Rebar quantity solutions- Calc finds instant square-up and drop for perfect layout- Reduce material waste and cut estimate timeDimensional Math and Conversions Built into the Calculator- Yards- Feet-Inch-Fractions- Metric (m, cm, mm)- Decimal Feet (10ths, 100ths), Decimal Inches - D.M.S. to Decimal Degree Conversions.Calculator Contains Built-in Area and Volume Solutions- Length, Width, Height (Depth) keys - Square and Cubic formats- Column/Cone Area and Volume- Instant Weight per Volume; Pounds, Tons, Kilograms or Metric Tons.- Blocks - FootingsDedicated Functions and Keys Help You Solve- Instant Square-up and Drop - Complete Stair calculations: - Risers- Treads- Stringers - Incline Angle- Rebar: - Total Linear Feet - Calculate Weight for Rebar Sizes- Store Rebar Sizes- Inset- On-center Spacing- Number of Loads: calculate the number of truck Loads based on Load size.- Calculate number of bags for small jobs.- Equal Sided Polygons- Board Feet of lumber for formsSpecial Functions- Haptic Feedback (optional)- Entry Editing Backspace Key â with a swipe of a finger- Cost per Unit: Solve unit cost and pricing- Paperless Tape- 4 Memories- User-Definable PreferencesMakes estimating easier for Contractors, Estimators, Concrete Pros & More.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Awesome Very useful, only calculator I\'ve seen that you don\'t need a degree to figure rebar. I give it ten stars!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: If you do concrete you need this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
